result.reason: Error code 6151 (0x1807) is an unhandled RDP disconnect reason indicating authentication authority issues or domain trust failures, often related to NLA; a friendly error message should be added.
result.approach: In 'RDPEvent_OnDisconnected', add a check for disconnect reason 6151 (0x1807) and set a descriptive error message advising the user to check NLA settings or domain trust.
